ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] neck wear
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally I have gone the hard core Armor Class route.  So my current neckwear is a Polished Mithril Torque (ac 7 +13 int +13 wis).  I keep a white gold
ygData.messageBody:
Personally I have gone the hard core Armor Class route. So my current
neckwear is a Polished Mithril Torque (ac 7 +13 int +13 wis). I keep a
white gold necklace handy for dragon runs.

-------------------------------------------------
Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/

-----Original Message-----
From: Tork [mailto:tdomeii@...]
Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 12:10 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] neck wear


From: Tork <tdomeii@...>

Okay, semi newbie question here since I never really
gave it any thought:

What do you guys use in your neck spot? I was using a
+9 cha piece of jewelry simply because I couldn't
think of anything else, but I switched to a cape of
midnight mist (+5 str +7 save magic ac 2). I'll keep
the +9 cha piece of jewelry for charming and pixie
striking but I can't see wearing it around when 90% of
what I do is chains and manasong (usual group is
war/cle/enc/wiz/sha, its silly for me to try and out
buff any of them). The other 10% consists of "I AM
PLAYING MANASONG." :)

Thanks,
-Tork@Nameless
